  2. Melania Trump Has a Warning for Humanity: ‘The Robots Are Here’  The New York Times
  3. Big Tech bosses court favour with Trumps at White House dinner  Financial Times
  4. New White House commitments empower teachers, students, and job seekers through AI skilling and learning  The Official Microsoft Blog
  5. First Lady Melania Trump warns 'robots are here' in rare public outing  BBC

item.title: OpenAI to launch its first AI chip in 2026 with Broadcom, FT reports - Reuters
item.description:
1. OpenAI to launch its first AI chip in 2026 with Broadcom, FT reports  Reuters
  2. OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom  Financial Times
  3. Broadcom stock jumps 15% on new $10 billion customer that analysts say is OpenAI  CNBC
  4. Broadcom is starting to look ‘eerily reminiscent’ of Nvidia. Both stocks are feeling the impact.  MarketWatch
  5. OpenAI, Broadcom Make $10 Billion Deal for Custom AI Chips  The Wall Street Journal
